item.title: ‘Grand Theft Auto VI’ Finally Seems Married To Its Third Release Date
item.description: GTA VI has been delayed twice, but a new earnings report suggests that yes, this latest release date is going to stick.

item.title: Disney Plus’ Best New Show Lands Has A 100% Rotten Tomatoes Critic Score
item.description: A new show has arrived on Disney Plus that has a 100% Rotten Tomatoes score, and is the revival of a slate of classic characters.
